entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Chetwynd
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:53 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.3°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Periods of rain mixed with snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023
